description: @Last Software initially developed SketchUp and released it in 2000. Then, Google acquired @Last Software in 2006 and developed SketchUp until 2012, when Trimble purchased the software.
Before SketchUp Pro (version 6), the Style Builder was separate from SketchUp. However, since version 6, the Style Builder is included with SketchUp Pro.

You can access styles in the Styles panel in the Default Tray. After selecting the style, you can apply it to your drawings to give them a specific appearance (like a hand-drawn aesthetic) and make them look uniform.
